channel.title: Comments on: Pear and Raspberry Bread

item.title: By: Isabella
item.dc:creator: Isabella
item.description: I work in a cafe and admit that the pear and raspberry bread we sell is my absolute guilty pleasure, but it is nothing compared to your recipe! It was so beautiful and moist, with just the right ratio of ingredient's, alot lighter than the cafe bought bread to, so i didnt feel quite as naughty! fantastic served toasted with a dollop of greek yogurt and some more fresh raspberries. The ones coming out of the hunter valley at the moment are just delish. So happy i stumbled upon your blog, its added to my daily to do list now.
item.content:encoded:
I work in a cafe and admit that the pear and raspberry bread we sell is my absolute guilty pleasure, but it is nothing compared to your recipe!
It was so beautiful and moist, with just the right ratio of ingredient’s, alot lighter than the cafe bought bread to, so i didnt feel quite as naughty!
fantastic served toasted with a dollop of greek yogurt and some more fresh raspberries. The ones coming out of the hunter valley at the moment are just delish.
So happy i stumbled upon your blog, its added to my daily to do list now.

item.title: By: Kayleen
item.dc:creator: Kayleen
item.description: Hi there I just found your recipe by accident after surfing the net. What I loved is the amazing photographs and blog with the recipe. I have just made this lovely recipe pear and raspberry loaf (it's actually in the oven now). The house smells incredible. The kids and I have already licked the beaters and the spoon. I cannot wait to have a slice. I now want to see what other recipes you have on your site. Thank you - your amazing!
item.content:encoded:
Hi there
I just found your recipe by accident after surfing the net. What I loved is the amazing photographs and blog with the recipe. I have just made this lovely recipe pear and raspberry loaf (it’s actually in the oven now). The house smells incredible. The kids and I have already licked the beaters and the spoon. I cannot wait to have a slice. I now want to see what other recipes you have on your site. Thank you – your amazing!

item.title: By: Jillian Staggs
item.dc:creator: Jillian Staggs
item.description: Hi, I have just stumbled across your blog. I love it! I am definitely making this Pear and Raspberry bread. Jill
item.content:encoded: Hi, I have just stumbled across your blog. I love it! I am definitely making this Pear and Raspberry bread. Jill

item.title: By: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.dc:creator: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.description: Yummy. I love pear, too. This would be such a great breakfast. Like Steph says above, funny how people call it a bread (instead of cake) to maybe make it sound healthier. All in moderation, right!
item.content:encoded: Yummy. I love pear, too. This would be such a great breakfast. Like Steph says above, funny how people call it a bread (instead of cake) to maybe make it sound healthier. All in moderation, right!

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi Lorraine - It sure is the time to go pear crazy :P . A pear and cheddar loaf sounds very interesting, did it work well?
Hi Simon - It was nice and moist, although did lose a little of that with storing.
Hi Steph - Hehe, I know... they are much more like cakes then breads... :P
Hi Alexandra - I hope you get a chance to try it, it's lovely. I see it at heaps of places near where I live and work.
Hi Y - Yep.... I can just remember the flavours... perhaps time I make another one.
Hi Maria - It tastes fantastic warm with a bit of butter, hope you get a chance to try it!
Hi Ann - Thanks, it is yummy, I'm glad I was introduced to the recipe :)
item.content:encoded:
Hi Lorraine – It sure is the time to go pear crazy ðŸ˜› . A pear and cheddar loaf sounds very interesting, did it work well?

Hi Simon – It was nice and moist, although did lose a little of that with storing.

Hi Steph – Hehe, I know… they are much more like cakes then breads… ðŸ˜›

Hi Alexandra – I hope you get a chance to try it, it’s lovely. I see it at heaps of places near where I live and work.

Hi Y – Yep…. I can just remember the flavours… perhaps time I make another one.

Hi Maria – It tastes fantastic warm with a bit of butter, hope you get a chance to try it!

Hi Ann – Thanks, it is yummy, I’m glad I was introduced to the recipe ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Ann
item.dc:creator: Ann
item.description: Wow.. perfectly baked yummy treats! love the moisty cake.
item.content:encoded: Wow.. perfectly baked yummy treats! love the moisty cake.

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: Pear and Raspberry bread, never heard of it, but it definitely looks tasty. I bet it would taste great warm with some butter spread ontop! YUM!
item.content:encoded: Pear and Raspberry bread, never heard of it, but it definitely looks tasty. I bet it would taste great warm with some butter spread ontop! YUM!

item.title: By: Y
item.dc:creator: Y
item.description: That bread looks so tasty! I can just imagine the flavours too..mmmm..
item.content:encoded: That bread looks so tasty! I can just imagine the flavours too..mmmm..

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: That is a lot of pears! Lucky you found a good use for them.
item.content:encoded: That is a lot of pears! Lucky you found a good use for them.

item.title: By: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.dc:creator: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.description: Ohh...never thought of making anything like this before...but after looking at this...oh my how nice pear would be in a bread...will have to try this!
item.content:encoded: Ohh…never thought of making anything like this before…but after looking at this…oh my how nice pear would be in a bread…will have to try this!
